definition: heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)

sentences.english: Well heeled: The stars were back in their stilettos and glamorous frocks .
sentences.chinese: 女星們個個身着漂亮的連衣裙和高跟鞋。

sentences.english: Of course, what the king does, everyone else copies, so everyone who was anyone wore high heels with red soles and heels.
sentences.chinese: 當然，上行下效，大家全都穿上了紅底紅跟的高跟鞋。

sentences.english: Lydia always comes to work in a—mini-skirt and high heels.
sentences.chinese: 莉蒂雅總是穿着性感迷你裙和高跟鞋來上班。

sentences.english: The street vendor suggested that I should buy the high-heeled shoes in coffee.
sentences.chinese: 攤販老闆建議我應該買那雙咖啡色的高跟鞋。

sentences.english: High heels were invented by a woman who had been kissed on the forehead.
sentences.chinese: 高跟鞋是由一位曾被人吻過前額的女性發明的。

sentences.english: I'm not allowed to wear high-heeled shoes these days for fear that my spinal core will get hurt again.
sentences.chinese: 爲了怕脊椎神經再度受傷，最近我都不能穿高跟鞋了。

sentences.english: Heels also look a lot better with pencil skirts than with trousers flapping around them.
sentences.chinese: 高跟鞋配鉛筆裙也要比配罩在四周的褲子好看的。

sentences.english: The total affordable heavy makeup, dress, high heels, elegant, beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 濃妝淡抹總相宜，連衣裙，高跟鞋，優雅，明媚。

sentences.english: If the man likes high-heel shoe , there is not contention for this.
sentences.chinese: 男人喜歡高跟鞋，這大概沒什麼爭議。

sentences.english: I love cowgirl boots and heels!
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡牛仔靴和高跟鞋。

sentences.english: High-heel shoes have fallen out of favour with young ladies who prefer casual dress.
sentences.chinese: 那些愛穿休閒裝的年輕女士已經不再喜歡穿高跟鞋了。

sentences.english: Also, there's a high-heel shoe with different colored flowers inside.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，還有一雙裏面有不同顏色花的高跟鞋。

sentences.english: She minced into the room wearing very high heels.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着很高的高跟鞋，扭扭捏捏地走進房間。

sentences.english: And male's high-heel shoes may consider as a symbol of feministic.
sentences.chinese: 男性的高跟鞋，我可以當做是男女平等的另一個象徵。

sentences.english: the ground level, shoes clattering on the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 我趕緊跑下樓，高跟鞋底在樓梯上發出巨大的聲音。

definition: woman's suit/dress worn over a petticoat
